<Menu Category: KeyItems>

<Custom Equip Requirement Condition>
if (user.name() === $gameActors.actor(1).name()) {
  condition = true;
} else {
  condition = false;
}
</Custom Equip Requirement Condition>
<Custom Equip Requirement Text>
text = '\\c[16]Character: ';
if (user.name() === $gameActors.actor(1).name()) {
  text += '\\c[1]'
} else {
  text += '\\c[8]'
}
text += $gameActors.actor(1).name()
</Custom Equip Requirement Text>

many party members are downed, eventually having a negative effect.
name: Ethereal Bat's Spirit
note:
<Cannot Discard>
<Cannot Rename>
<Passive State: 119 to 122>
